sentences: Poiss, kuram, mis sa vehkled, kas sa ei saa minutitki rahu olla.
context: The Estonian word 'rahu' has two main meanings: 1) peace or quietness as a state of calm and tranquility, used in expressions like requesting someone to be quiet; 2) reef (the geological formation). The first meaning is more common in everyday language. It can appear in various grammatical forms including rahus (quietly), rahul (peacefully/quietly), and rahuta (without peace/quietly).
